headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KAUFMANN, PEGGY WEIL

snippet: KAUFMANN--Peggy Weil, of Sun City, AZ on February 2nd, 2016, formerly of Fort Lee, NJ and Lynbrook, LI. Devoted wife of Richard (deceased), beloved mother of James (Zilma) and Robert (Frances) Kaufmann. Loving grandmother of Laura (Gregg Arst), David (Sarah), Tessy and Julie. Silver Life Master at Bridge. Graduate of Cornell University. Loved by all who knew her. Contributions in her memory may be made to the Barnaret Temple Social Action Fund, 747 Rt. 208, Franklin Lakes, NJ 07407. 1/3
